price: Dájúdájú Olúwa rẹ, Ó kúkú mọ ohun tí igbá-àyà wọn ń fi pamọ́ àti ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣàfi hàn rẹ̀.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka layaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
